response.original_title: ●大学芸術学部映●学科大学生しゅりちゃん【仮名】「監督の大学の後輩がまさかのAV出演！？」釣り好き性格良しの可愛すぎる後輩AVデビュー 跡美しゅり
response.overview: One day. The girl who came to the interview. Cute, fishing enthusiast, good personality. AV inexperienced. When I was thinking of shooting, I was actually an active university student at my (director) graduated alma mater! !! Faculty of Arts Ei ● Department ●● Course ... Isn't it exactly the same! ?? Why did this kid want to appear in AV ... what kind of kid is this kid at school! ?? I wanted to see her more private and sneaked into my nostalgic mother school with a camera! !!
response.title: Juri [Pseudonym] Is A Fine Arts Major At College and When She Hears That Her Former Classmate - The Director - Does Porn She's Just Gotta Try It! She's A Sweet Girl Who Loves Two Flirt, And This Is Her Adult Video Debut Shuri Atomi
